text:
Lord Shiva became very pleased and agreed to make Daksha alive.
 All of them went to Kanakhal-the place where Daksha had organised the yagya ceremony.
 Veerbhadra too accompanied them.
 When they reached the site, Lord Shiva could not hold his laughter after seeing the destruction of the site.
 Anyway, he joined the head of a goat to the torso of Daksha's body and made him alive.
 He also compensated for all the losses which had been caused by the destruction.
 All the deities became very pleased and they eulogised Shiva.
title: Daksha becomes Alive
